Summary: bright star like or venus emitting blue/white light
trends: There has been one other sighting in lakeside
There was one other sighting in lakeside on or around April 12th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out at 7:56 to see if it was there again tonight. Exact same place as yesterday...did the same thing emitting light looking like a dragonfly or jellyfish with the lights coming off if like sunrays..I called a different neighbor tonight who watched it with me for over 20 minutes..I observed it until 8:38 when it lookex like it fell into cloud cover( ther were no clouds) and disappeared. Will be watching tomorrow. I felt fine watching it, my neighbor though was fearful of abduction.
